snippet.title: AKAI NOROI Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page now live! https://store.steampowered.com/app/880800/AKAI_NOROI/
Feel free to add to your wish-list!

AKAI NOROI is a Asian / Japanese story rich horror folklore inspired journey through the darkest of humanity. Explore the abandoned sleeping quarters, delve into the residents past, investigate, solve puzzles & riddles. Establish the truth about the mysterious disappearance of all the previous residents.

IndieDB page: https://www.indiedb.com/games/akai-noroi

Features:
    Dynamic paranormal event system.
    HUD objective and event system.
    Interact able environment.
    Puzzles - Secrets - The game changes the longer you stay in it.
    Investigation through journals etc.
    Unpredictable gameplay with focus on story and subtle horror.
    Horrifying AI
    Story rich gameplay with a immersive environment
    Three different endings depending on player choices
    Psychological horror and story rich character progression

Official Soundtrack Trailer Composer
Devel Sullivan
https://Twitter.com/SullivanDevel 
https://soundcloud.com/develsullivan

Developed by Aza Game Studio.
Follow my Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio
Official site: https://www.azagamestudio.com
